content: The journal version of Trident is accepted by IEEE/ACM ToN!
Our work ZuMa is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our three works mmHRR, mmTAI and mmJaw are accepted by IEEE ICPADS 2024!
Our paper ElaSe is accepted by IEEE/ACM IWQoS 2024 (Acceptance rate: 24.8%)!
The journal version of mmHawkeve is accepted by ACM TOSN!
Our paper Trident is accepted by IEEE INFOCOM 2024 (Acceptance rate: 19.5%)!
The journal version of AIM is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our SenSys paper MicNest is invited as Research Highlight article in ACM GetMobile Magazine!
Our paper BIFROST is accepted by ACM SenSys 2023!
Our paper Meta-Speaker is accepted by ACM MobiCom 2023 (Acceptance rate: 24.4%)!
The journal version of MicNest is accepted by IEEE TMC!
Our paper mmHawkeve is accepted by IEEE SECON 2023 (Acceptance rate: 23.6%)!
Our survey paper on mmWave-based human sensing is accepted by IEEE Communication Survey & Tutorial!
Our work MicNest won the Best Paper Runner-Up Award from ACM SenSys 2022 (Top 2 out of all 209 submissions)!
Our two works MicNest and AIM are accepted by ACM SenSys 2022 (Acceptance rate: 25%)!
